scenario_1.persona_content: A web developer who is interested in leveraging the latest technologies to enhance user experience. This person is familiar with web technologies and is looking for ways to implement AR in mobile websites. They are open to trying new tools and technologies and are eager to learn more about the capabilities of the Wikitude AR Window.
scenario_1.thought: As a web developer always looking for ways to improve user experience, I also believe in fairness. While getting 600 is tempting, I think the right option is better because it provides both Person A and myself with an equal amount (400 each). This promotes a sense of equality, which I value. I would choose the right option.

scenario_2.persona_content: A web developer who is interested in leveraging the latest technologies to enhance user experience. This person is familiar with web technologies and is looking for ways to implement AR in mobile websites. They are open to trying new tools and technologies and are eager to learn more about the capabilities of the Wikitude AR Window.
scenario_2.thought: As a web developer always looking for ways to innovate and enhance user experiences, I'm naturally inclined to consider the best outcome for myself while also acknowledging the other person's situation. In this scenario, option Right gives me a significantly higher amount (800) compared to option Left (500), while Person A still receives a non-negligible amount (200). While fairness is a consideration, the substantial increase in my own benefit makes option Right more appealing. It allows me to invest more in exploring new AR technologies and tools that could ultimately benefit a wider audience through improved user experiences on the web. Therefore, I choose Right.
